string.text:
Simple tin can, which can be found very often in the Zone. It is better not to collect and not anger the old merchant from outskirt.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:

%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140] Garbage

A large enough package of bolts, contains about 25 pieces. The usual, unremarkable bolts that stalkers use to detect anomalies.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:

%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140] common object

Fired shell casing, many stalkers use them to detect anomalies.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:

%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140] Common object

Psy-dogs are distinguished by powerful mental abilities, in particular, by the generation of illusions and the impact on the brain of other creatures, and it is safe to say that these forces originate in their brains. Interestingly, each mutant with such Psy-wave-related abilities has a similar brain structure. Scientists will pay generously for samples of such tissues. The brain has the smell of sour vegetables.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140] Mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140] High value

A mixture of potasium permanganate and an alcohol-containing substance. Suitable for external deactivation of objects by physically removing radioactive substances. It is impossible to deactivate unsealed or unpressurized items.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Allows you to deactivate items
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Self-made item

Spare parts of old weapons. The wooden elements are not to say that they are in good condition, for sure only beginners may be interested in buying these. Metal elements are also in relatively good condition.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Military product
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Shotgun repair(+5%)

Spare parts of automatic weapons: springs, strikers, receiver boxes, stocks, clips and much more. The components are in relatively good condition with the exception of wooden parts.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Military product
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Repair of Soviet weapons(+7%)

Spare parts of automatic weapons from Europe: springs, strikers, receiver boxes, stocks, clips and much more. The components are in relatively good condition with the exception of some polymer parts.

%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Repairing Õ¿“Œ weapons(+7%)

Spare parts of pistols with space in the CIS: springs, strikers, frames, clips and much more. The components are in relatively good condition with the exception of some plastic parts.

Spare parts sniper weapons with space CIS: springs, strikers, receiver, stocks, clips and much more. Composers are in relatively good condition with the exception of wooden parts.

A set of improvised tools and industrial high-tech tools of the highest quality for cutting and trimming. Allow to cut and disassemble any suit or helmet.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,155,155,155] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Technological devices
%c[0,255,1,1] ï %c[0,230,230,230]Allows you to work withHigh-tech items

A set of factory tools and improvised tools for cutting and trimming. Allow to disassemble any medium-tech suit, as well as gas masks.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,155,155,155] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Technological devices
%c[0,255,1,1] ï %c[0,230,230,230]Allows you to work with medium-tech suits

A set of tools for cutting and trimming, which was assembled from improvised means. Allow to sort only low-tech fabric items, as well as gas masks.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,155,155,155] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Technological devices
%c[0,255,1,1] ï %c[0,230,230,230]Allows you to work with low-tech suits

A set of improvised tools and rough tools for disassembly. Allows you to disassemble the guns in any form, the tools are not enough for greater manufacturability. 
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,155,155,155] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Technological devices
%c[0,255,1,1] ï %c[0,230,230,230]Allows you to work with low-tech items

Factory set of tools and tools for disassembling. Allows you to disassemble almost everything except 7.92 caliber rifles and some sniper rifles.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,155,155,155] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Technological devices
%c[0,255,1,1] ï %c[0,230,230,230]Allows you to work with medium-tech items

A set of high-quality industrial tools and tools for disassembly. Allows you to disassemble absolutely any weapon.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,155,155,155] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Technological devices
%c[0,255,1,1] ï %c[0,230,230,230]Allows you to work with High-tech items

The armored plate of the ìSEVAî model, cut out of the suit. Made by technology of one of the Kiev defense research institutes. Able to stop a pistol bullet and absorb damage from edged weapons. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Armor repair(+8%)

Ceramic-composite panel model ´ESAPIª. Provides protection class 4. Made of high quality composite materials and ceramics, protective substances were applied on top of the element. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Armor repair(+13%)

The armor "SAPI" of lightweight combined armor. Provides protection class 3. Made of high quality materials. On the front side of the armored panels, on top of the ceramic layer, there is a protective layer designed to increase the operational survivability of the armored panel. Outside the panel is covered with nylon. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Armor repair(+10%)

Handicraft armor of Kevlar and aramid. Provides class 2 protection. Made in the Zone from materials brought from the perimeter. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140] used for:%c[0,170,170,170] armor repair(+7%)

Homemade armored element from Kevlar and thick fabric. Provides class 1 protection. Made in the Zone from materials brought from the perimeter.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140] used for:%c[0,170,170,170] armor repair(+5%)

Native heavy armor "Granite-4M" of composite materials and ceramics. Provides class 5 protection. Custom-made perimeter-guarded military units for suits. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140] used for:%c[0,170,170,170] armor repair(+15%)

Unknown armor element, made of alloys and reinforced fabrics. Extremely heavy. Provides class 5 protection. Obviously not handicraft. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140] used for:%c[0,170,170,170] armor repair(+15%)

Carved unloading pocket out of the suit. Made from thick and high-quality fabric. Can be used as a repair material.

%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Armor repair(+3%)

A small homemade armor plate from improvised means. Can be used as a repair material.

%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Armor repair(+4%)

Green fabric, cut out of the suit of the appropriate color. Very high quality and dense fabric. Can be used as a repair material.

%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Armor repair(+3%)

One of the servo engines that was removed from a exoskeleton. If you have a repair kit, you can replace the existing engine at the exoskeleton.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]High-tech item
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Exoskeleton repair(+20%)

Parts of polymer parts cut from somewhere. Can be used as patches for suits or gas masks.

%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Suits and helmets repair(+4%)

Pieces of glass cut out of gas masks or helmets. Can replace broken glass in almost any helmet with a good repair kit.

%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Helmets repair(+3%)

A PCB is a dielectric plate, on the surface and/or in the volume of which electrically conductive electronic circuits are formed. The printed circuit board is designed for the electrical and mechanical connection of various electronic components. The electronic components on the printed circuit board are connected by their leads to the elements of the conductive pattern, usually by soldering.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Helmets repair(+3%)

Specialized kit for replacing the servo of the exoskeleton in the field. Includes required materials as well as calibration tools. Can only be used to replace the servo.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Military product
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Used for:%c[0,170,170,170]Exoskeleton repair

The self-made cartridge of the 12th caliber, equipped with pellets with a diameter of 6 mm. At close distances, it has a huge slaughter and stopping action. Designed for firing of smooth-bore weapons and shotguns.
 
%c[0,93,0,116] ï %c[0,140,140,140] Pierce armor class: %c[0,170,170,170]I

%c[0,170,170,170]FEATURE:
 
%c[0,93,0,116] ï %c[0,140,140,140] increased scatter of balls at a short distance

Wads, sleeves, shot, in front of you all the necessary components of cartridges of caliber 12x70. It seems that they are enough for 10 rounds.

Wads, sleeves, shot, in front of you all the necessary components of cartridges caliber 12x76. That seem to be enough for 30 cartridges.

Threads, needles, zippers and doggies. Set with everything you need for sewing and embroidery.

All major components for the manufacture of a sleeping bag. Fabric, thread, zipper and more.

Self-roll cigarette made from tobacco and handmade paper.

It is a part of an explosive device containing an explosive charge that is more sensitive to external influences than a high explosive of a main charge. The detonator is designed to reliably excite the explosion of the main charge of an artillery shell, mines, bombs, missile warheads, torpedoes, as well as a subversive charge. 
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140] technological item

Old razor blades, very sharp. Can be used for cutting fabrics and other materials. 
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140] technological item

Stainless scissors, sharpened. They cut well, sharpened.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140] technological item

Set of scissors and razor blades. Old blades, but still sharp enough to cut and textile scissors. Stainless scissors, sharpened. They cut well, sharpened.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140] technological items
Scissors, blades and a swiss knife

Set of scissors, blades and swiss knife. Old blades, but still sharp enough to cut and textile scissors. Stainless scissors, sharpened. They cut well, sharpened.

Set of swiss knife and cutlery. Good for disassembling something small.

Flash card with a virus recorded dangerous program - xHack version 1.0. Known for being able to hack all accounts and accounts on the victim's device, redirecting all found resources to the specified addresses. Can hack any kind of PDA and PC. To install the program, you need an activation key.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Hacking accounts and personal files
%c[255,238,153,26] ï %c[0,140,140,140]Attention:%c[0,170,170,170]USING THIS SOFTWARE IS ILLEGAL

Heavy metal container in which equipment or provisions can be transported. Heavy enough to carry alone.

%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140] technological item 
%c[0,153,255,255] ï %c[0,140,140,140] used to supply local traders

Simple wooden box. Not so valueable, isn't waterproofed and has a small capacity. Once upon a time was used by military forces to store ammunition.
